mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_comment (notice_no, comment_content, member_id) VALUES (#{notice_no}, #{comment_content}, #{member_id});
mapper.select: SELECT nc.*, m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_class FROM notice_comment nc JOIN member m ON nc.member_id = m.member_id WHERE nc.notice_no = #{notice_no} AND nc.comment_isshow = 'Y';
